item.title: conference and trade show exp trade_show
item.description: - Sales of $484 million increased 21 percent year-over-year; growth across all regions and end markets - Earnings per diluted share (EPS) of $0.43 and adjusted EPS of $0.44 - Strong cash flow from operations of $16 million; up approximately 60 percent year-over-year - Significant operating leverage
item.dc:creator: Kennametal Inc. News Releases
